Class SyQueryResult

QueryResult
  |
  +--SyQueryResult
public class SyQueryResult
extends QueryResult

Class SyQueryResult provides an implementation of the QueryResult interface for use with the SyDatabase class.

As class SyDatabase, this class isn't officially supported.

According to the PHP manual (version 4.2.0), there is no function to get an associative array as a row-result, but it is possible to get a row as both an indexed and an associative array. When an associative array is requested from this class, it requests the full array from the database, and then filters out the indexed elements.

See Also:
SyDatabase

Method Detail

clear

public void clear()
Description copied from class: QueryResult
Clear the result data from memory; this method need only be called if memory usage is high in a single script. After calling this method, the result can no longer be accessed.
Overrides:
clear in class QueryResult

getErrorMessage

public string getErrorMessage()
Description copied from class: QueryResult
Get the error message; useful in case isSuccess() returns false. Returns the empty string if there was no error.
Overrides:
getErrorMessage in class QueryResult

getRow

public array getRow(var $index,
                    var $type)
Description copied from class: QueryResult
Get the row at the specified index for a SELECT-query. The optional argument $type defines how the row should be retrieved: as an indexed array (ECLIPSE_DB_NUM), an associative array (ECLIPSE_DB_ASSOC) or as both an indexed and an associative array (ECLIPSE_DB_BOTH). The latter is the default.
Overrides:
getRow in class QueryResult
Parameters:
$type - Default Value: ECLIPSE_DB_BOTH
